citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available for inspection at 2:00PM on Thursday 21 January 2016. The inspector was
informed by the licensee of a family related situation in which the licensee would be unable to accompany through
the facility and would not be available until evening. No other authorized person was available for inspection.

Section 2.126(b) - Access and inspection of records and property: A responsible adult shall be made available to
accompany APHIS officials during the inspection process.
A responsible adult was not available for inspection at 2:00PM on Thursday 21 January 2016.   The inspector was
